q: Simon Cowell may court Paula Abdul for X Factor panel Simon Cowell wants his new Fox talent series The X Factor to include controversy, vocal groups and, maybe, Paula Abdul on the judging panel. In addition to creating the jobs of the future, clean energy benefits the USeconomy by ultimately making energy costs more affordable for consumers- especially if their dollars stay in America,'' Sergio Marchionne said in a statement. statement that some objects including a Heart Scarab and a small Ushabti statue were found. Part of a coffin dating back to the Modern Kingdom 3,000 years ago was also found outside the museum. We found two of the eight missing artefacts outside the museum between a government building that got burnt and the gift shop. We are continuing the search and will find more, Zahi Hawass told Reuters.
